          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed depending on mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit abhängig von Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse selon la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade dependendo da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità secondo massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα ανάλογα με τη μάζα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad dependiendo de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the time it will take trucks A, B, and C carrying different masses to go from 0 to 5 metres per second.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Seconds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tonnes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trucks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Zeit, die sie 
LKWAS A nimmt, B und C, das unterschiedliche Massen trägt, um zu 
gehen von 0 bis 5 Meter pro Sekunde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le temps où elle 
prendra les camions A, B, et C portant les différentes masses pour 
aller de 0 à 5 mètres par seconde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o tempo onde fará 
exame dos caminhões A, B, e C que carrega massas diferentes para ir  
0 a 5 medidores por o segundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il tempo che 
prenderà i camion A, la B e la C che trasporta le masse differenti 
per andare 0 - 5 tester al secondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το χρόνο που θα πάρει τα 
truck Α, β, και γ που φέρνουν τις διαφορετικές μάζες για να 
πάει από 0 έως 5 μέτρα ανά δευτερόλεπτο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el tiempo que tomará 
los carros A, B, y C que lleva diversas masas para ir a partir 0 a 5 
contadores por segundo.</string>
          </description>
